job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer

We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of a product that utilizes generative AI technology, including conversational agents, and focuses on building user-friendly applications. It mentions translating new technologies into a product, developing prototypes, and iteratively improving them based on user testing, which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The role involves working with new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents, and the description highlights the development of user-facing software systems and API development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product' and 'backend and API development experience' directly relates to building and integrating AI features into user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'quickly develop prototypes' and 'iteratively improve these prototypes' points to the software development lifecycle for new product features.
The requirement for 'backend and API development experience' is a core component of software development for AI-powered applications.
The job explicitly states the team is 'leveraging new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents', which falls under the domain of generative modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents

job_tasks.justification: The goal of 'support healthcare providers in their logistical processes' and 'support healthcare workers with logistical challenges' shows an understanding of the business context for the AI product.
job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies' and implies deployment and maintenance of these technologies within a product context, which relates to operational aspects.
job_tasks.phrase: iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'conversational agents' is a direct reference to a type of generative AI model.
The role involves 'collaborate with the team' and working with a 'UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members', indicating strong collaboration needs.
The job explicitly asks for 'problem-solving skills' and mentions being 'willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery', highlighting pragmatism.
The description states 'willingness to learn and implement new technologies' and the 'freedom given to grow and to develop', emphasizing learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together' strongly suggests innovation and ownership.
job_tasks.phrase: I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together.

soft_skills.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
